summary: What's going on guys? This is my third mod, which improves the Imperial Bow.
descriptionHtml:
What's going on guys? This is my third mod, which improves the Imperial Bow.

It increases the speed to 1.45 (from 0.8750) and increases the damage to 36 (from 9).

The improved bow's name is Centurion Bow. It can be bought in the Solitude Fletcher.

This mod should be compatible with all mods.

Also on the Steam Workshop at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=254341272

I would really appreciate suggestions, critiques, etc. Also if it doesnâ€™t work with a mod or just doesn't work, please let me know.

If you enjoy this mod, please, leave a like. It helps get this mod noticed.

Thumbnail and screenshots taken and edited by me.
author: hmjki
